An Eagles spokesman indicated yesterday that Michael Vick probably will not attend a Super Bowl party being promoted under his name tonight in Dallas.`` Dallas Dynasty 2011'' is an event being billed as the premier A-list high society event of the 2011 Super Bowl. according to Bloomberg. Eric Schmidt also filed to sell 5.8% of his huge 9.2 million-share stake in Google. At January 21's closing price, the transaction would be valued at$ 326.7 million.
